about_the_game:
Vivid Spirit is a colorful hand drawn action-packed platformer where color dictates your actions. You'll guide our heroic young lady, Vivid, through the artistic world of Paper Craft and discover treasure, fight off amphibious wizards, and uncover the truth behind her lack of color. You'll even be able to play as her cute dog, Spirit!



Attack In Color!
Red, Yellow, and Blue. These are the three colors Vivid and Spirit can shift between. They can only use certain weapons or powers while a specific color. It's integral that you find methods to swapping your color, such as Stomping Colored Blocks, to utilize different abilities for different situations. This is because different Color Attacks have different properties, such as the Golden Bow shooting far but only horizontally, while the Azure Axe can be tossed far up vertically. As you progress there will be more demanding situations where certain abilities are favored over others, and figuring how to Color Swap efficiently will be the key to success!



Over 5 Different Stories!
There are multiple adventures to play from in Vivid! Some need to be unlocked by completing others, but all are important to the overarching plot. In one adventure, you'll play as Vivid alone whose trying to rescue Spirit. In another tale, you'll play as Spirit alone while trying to reclaim her lost toys. And not all stories play similarly; some are simple level to level stages, while others are open world! And expect to play as a tag team between Vivid and Spirit as you progress.

There are many different abilities and items to collect, as well as foes to encounter!
  • 18 Weapons to try out!
  • 90+ Moves to utilize!
  • 13+ Bosses to fight!
  • 5+ Stories to play through!
